attributes.action: Petition to get the Government to gather international support for changes Vienna Convention on Diplomatic Relations (1961)
attributes.additional_details: I am launching a campaign for the government of Great Britain and Northern Ireland to renegotiate the terms of the Vienna Convention on Diplomatic Relations (1961) so that diplomats that are reasonable for carrying out criminal offences are charged and prosecuted whether that be (Summary offences) such as fraud and burglary or serious offences (Indictable offences) such as GBH, Rape, Murder and Attempted Murder.
